newsitem.title: JAPAN: BOJ says rate rise reflects brighter outlook.
newsitem.headline: BOJ says rate rise reflects brighter outlook.

text.p: Bank of Japan (BOJ) Governor Yasuo Matsushita said on Wednesday that a recent rise in Japan's long-term interest rates reflects confidence in the economic outlook.

"I cannot comment on daily movements of long-term interest rates. But looking at it in a longer-term perspective, the rise in long-term interest rates is a reflection of confidence in the economic outlook. Looking at the recent moves, we are gradually starting to feel that way as well," Matsushita told a parliamentary committee meeting.
